content: Every class moved online during the spring and summer semesters. Many of the support services are just now opening up on an appt basis only (and that's really just to return things not to check out new stuff). Our governor in New Mexico has been really on top of issuing social distancing order which have kept our spread rate low but means we have been very isolated for weeks. We don't expect to be able to go out dancing or to attend sports/music events until they distribute a vaccine.
